name: Holidecember RPG
description:
Holidecember RPG: A BTFF RPG Christmas Adventure, or just Holidecember RPG, is a short Christmas-themed RPG focused on exploration with a few simple combat encounters. It serves as a sequel to Spooktober RPG, expanding on the characters and lore that it introduced into the BTFF RPG franchise.

Synopsis

On paper, this is a retelling of Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol. In practice, it's a game where a depressed ghost gets even more depressed and a talking cat punches an old man in the middle of a casino. Good luck!
